_sText:
2 trucks carrying nukes have crashed in the city of stockberg.

Counter Terrorists: Defend the crashed trucks, prevent the terrorists from planting the bomb.

Terrorists: Plant the bomb near one of the crashed trucks, prevent the counter terrorists from winning.

This is the improved version of my first counter strike source map, de_stockberg. I know I could of just updated the original map but I decided not to so other people can play the original map.

FEATURES
-3d skybox
-improved buildings
-improved bomb sites
-improved cover
-some sniper spots
and nav mesh for bots

It might not be the best since i'm still quite new to hammer.

INSTALLATION
1. drag in ALL the files (including the txt file)
2. create a new server
3. select de_stockberg_2
4. and now you can play it.
